title: Cars, Coffee, and a Slightly Used Casket
description: Our favorite car dealer is back, kicking ass and taking names, and she's just as fabulous as ever.Julia Karr is a used car lot owner and she isn't expecting an invitation to the popularity pool. Her business is drowning with past due accounts, difficult customers and crazy repossessions. In order to get the vacation of her dreams, Julia makes a deal with her husband.After catching a burglar, tackling a customer, and looking down the barrel of a gun, it's clear to this feisty car dealer that her vacation may be harder to achieve than she thought. Daily chaos drives Julia to eat more chocolate, buy more wine, and prepare for the afterlife. She could blame it on the contractor, the cheap casket, or the naked friend, but she'd rather blame it on the car lot.
author: K.C. Hilton
